meanings.sent1: She blubs when she is sad.
meanings.sent2: The baby blubs loudly when he is hungry.
meanings.sent3: The clown blubs comically during the show.
meanings.sent4: Her heart blubs with sorrow as she reads the sad story.
meanings.sent5: The thunderstorm blubs fiercely outside the window.

meanings.sent1: I heard the blubs coming from the next room.
meanings.sent2: The blubs of the child echoed through the house.
meanings.sent3: The blubs of the puppy were both sad and adorable.
meanings.sent4: The blubs of the violin filled the concert hall.
meanings.sent5: The blubs of the waterfall were soothing to listen to.
